title: A Promise (2R112)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. While you can spot Frodo and Sam and neither is exhausted, each is strength +1.
Lore:	”'But I'm glad Sam. I cannot tell you how glad. Come along! It is plain that we were meant to go together.'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Version: +.
